metadata.title: USN-6148-1 -- SNI Proxy vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that SNI Proxy did not properly handle wildcard backend hosts. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a buffer overflow, resulting in a denial of service, or arbitrary code execution.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6148-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  sniproxy - 0.6.0-1ubuntu0.1 No subscription required
